sentences.en: ‘That’s not true,’ she protested in a shrill voice.
A hum of shrill voices reverberated against the low ceiling.
sentences.cn: 低矮的天花板下回响着尖细嗓音的嗡嗡声.

sentences.en: A shrill trumpet - call had pierced the air.
sentences.cn: 一阵刺耳的喇叭声响了起来.

sentences.en: His criticism was so shrill that it provoked resentment.
sentences.cn: 他的批评太尖刻,引起了怨恨.

sentences.en: His own voice sounded shrill and curious in his ear.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己的声音既尖利又古怪.

sentences.en: His voice was shrill, but very clear and articulate.
sentences.cn: 他嗓音尖锐, 但是嘹亮而清晰.
玛丽·安的声音变得尖厉了。

sentences.en: She had a shrill high - pitched voice.
She wore a tight shrill green dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿一件碧绿的紧身连衣裙.

sentences.en: Shrill cries and startled oaths flew up around us as pandemonium broke out.
sentences.cn: 骚乱爆发时，我们周围充斥着尖厉的哭喊声和难以入耳的咒骂声。

sentences.en: Shrill voices on both sides of the Atlantic are advocating protectionism.
sentences.cn: 大西洋两岸都在大肆鼓吹贸易保护主义。

sentences.en: Telephones shrill uselessly in deserted offices.
sentences.cn: 在空无一人的办公室里,电话铃徒然发出尖锐刺耳的响声.

sentences.en: The noise of the wind over the heath was shrill.
sentences.cn: 吹过荒原的狂风,声音那样尖锐.
刺耳的电话铃响了两下。

sentences.en: The unearthly silence was broken by a shrill screaming.
sentences.cn: 一声尖叫打破了这可怕的沉寂。

sentences.en: We could hear the shrill of the midsummer cricket.
sentences.cn: 我们可以听到仲夏时节蟋蟀的尖叫声.

sentences.en: Whistles began to shrill outside the barn.
sentences.cn: 哨声开始在谷仓外面尖叫.

trans.tran_cn: （声音）尖锐的，刺耳的，高频率的，强烈的，刺激的
trans.tran_en: (of sounds or voices) very high and loud, in an unpleasant way
to produce a very high and unpleasant sound
to produce a very high and unpleasant sound

trans.tran_cn: 尖叫，发出一种尖锐的声音
以尖声的方式说出，尖叫
